717620.name: Arrow Heads - Soundtrack
717620.description:
Message from the Composer


When I compose for a game I always ask, “what are the keywords that best describe your game?”. This is what the OddBird Team said:

“All things zany and simple, energetic, upbeat, get people excited, arcady, cartoony, borderlands, over the top, as silly and crazy as possible, bears and honey, street fighter, jazzy electro, donkey kong & smash bros, metroid prime, sunset overdrive”

That description and some personality-driven character art gave me a vision of the blue bird character taking a birdbath in the middle of the forest; concerned only with the pompous tune on his beak. Out of that, the weird and catchy title music was born, the sound palette was established, and the music evolved into a colourful, unique, dynamic soundtrack that we think you’ll dig!

Oh, and to say that the “Birds of a Feather” track is a surprising treat would be a gross understatement! We had a blast with that one; you’ll definitely want to hear it.

Enjoy!

Tracks

1. Camp Fire Arrows

2. A Blue Bird Bath
3. Arrow Forge
4. Bear House
5. An Oddbird Christmas
6. Sky Fall
7. Avian Ruins
8. Summit
9. Player Lobby
10. Pirate Ship
11. Cliffside
12. El Pollo
13. Factory
14. Beach
15. Post-Match Lobby
16. Birds Of A Feather (feat. The Oddbird Team, Seb, Blue Bird)
